content.value:
DM: "I see you're following [so-and-so]. Did you know they're a sex worker?"

Me: "Yep"

DM: "Doesn't it bother you that you could be associated with that?"

Me: "Someone working for a living in the manner they choose? Nope, not at all."

Me: <block sender>

#DoBetterBeBetter
